text_content.paragraph: All wells/sites that meet the search criteria display in the Data Grid. Select a well(s) and then use the commands found in the Search Results Toolbar located above the Data Grid, to interact with the results. Right-clicking on a well/site also displays commands to interact with the results.

graphic.alt: Graphic of the Results Interface showing the Data Grid and the Search Results Toolbar labeled and highlighted.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: All properties that meet the search criteria will display in the Data Grid. Use the commands found in the Search Results Toolbar located above the Data Grid, to interact with the results. Right-clicking on a property also displays commands to interact with the results.
